about_the_game:
Do you want to complete Sexcraft - Sofiya and the Lewd Clan getting the easier ways and unlocking the whole content of the game?



This DLC contains a pdf document DETAILING THE WHOLE CONTENT (aka all 44 rooms maps, gameplay info and more) and showing the hidden objects of the game.

To access the document, you need to go to:

Location:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Sexcraft - Sofiya and the Lewd Clan\Walkthrough\

content_descriptors.notes: Contains strong language and is about sexual themes.
